projectGridLines.title: Digital Marketing Intern
projectGridLines.description:
·        Creative Content Writing: Develop engaging content for digital platforms, showcasing specific aspects of the product for global audience (US, Europe, Australia).

·        Graphic Design Support: Assist in curating and designing graphics & marketing materials for various campaigns that run on various channels

·        Campaign Collaboration: Contribute to the planning and execution of innovative digital marketing campaigns on website, social media, SEO and other direct & indirect channels

·        Data Analysis Assistance: Help analyze marketing metrics to optimize campaign performance, leveraging both creative and analytical skills.

Skill sets: 

Creative writing, Graphic design, Data analytics


Expected learning: 

·        How to think about digital content creation for global B2B selling of a SaaS product

·        How to create focused content pieces that drive the reader / viewer to action

·        How to track marketing efficiency and optimize existing campaigns for more leads

·        How to think about which campaigns to run based on target audience

·        Working in a small and highly efficient team of individuals with high expectations

·        This role opens many career paths in general management as well as digital marketing space such as digital marketing specialist, marketing manager, brand manager, content specialist, B2B Marketing Management etc…

·        Smart & quick learners with interest in content writing & graphic designing and a strong inclination to learn how business works are encouraged to apply.

projectGridLines.title: Business Solution Engineer Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: 

·        Communicate with clients based in US, Europe & ANZ on a daily basis.

·        Understand business problems and implement solutions by integrating CloudFiles with Salesforce / HubSpot CRMs.

·        Use various technical concepts of CRM solutioning such as widgets, workflows, reports etc… to create solutions for clients.

·        Our clients include some very large brands and you will be in constant touch with their team(s) to implement solutions for them.

 

 

Skill sets: 

Problem Solving, CRM Solutioning, Communication

Expected learning: 

·        How large companies manage their day to day operations using CRM(s)

·        How CloudFiles solves the business documents challenge for these companies

·        How to keep customers of a B2B SaaS firm satisfied with instant & constant communication

·        Working in a small and highly efficient team of individuals with high expectations

·        This role opens many career paths in general management as well as customer success, sales, partnerships etc…

·        Smart & quick learners with interest in the mechanics of large businesses and a strong inclination to respond effectively & immediately should apply.
